title: Does a platform like Quora have the potential to develop and reveal innovations in any kind of collective innovation project? - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe most of Quora's features could indeed be put to good use in a collective innovation platform, but I don't expect the Quora team to pursue that path as they are quite focused already. Technically, I think Quora could be (and has been) used as-is for fleshing out ideas, but it is a little contrived because the affordances for contextual subspaces are limited - everything has global scope.
